6.2.4.3 CONTEXT ATTRIBUTES

Absolute (or Global) Placement

Some features are defined in terms of their placement on the part, that is whether they are on front or back, or on bottom or top. A vent hole is a good example of this. Vent holes are used to allow excess moisture to escape from a lamp housing and are located at the bottom of a part.

Models for Concurrent Engineering Design - 15 Jul 1997
